1.    Bachelor of Computer Applications
2.    Bachelor degree in Science / Engineering with any of the following
Candidates writing their final year examinations March-June 2025 are eligible to apply.
why_choose: Why choose this course? Innovate solutions for industry challenges. Explore AI and ML in research institutions. Apply programming for future business needs. Utilise tools for high-end intelligent systems. Adhere to ethics in AI application development. Promote technology for sustainable environmental practices.
what_learn: What you will learn? Investigate and innovate solutions for real-world industry challenges, honing problem-solving skills in practical applications. Explore AI and ML within research institutions, gaining insights into cutting-edge advancements and industry applications. Apply programming principles to develop automated solutions, addressing future business and societal needs with proficiency and foresight. Possess the skills to use or develop advanced tools, contributing to the creation of sophisticated intelligent systems in diverse domains. Adopt professional ethics in AI application development, ensuring responsible practices and ethical considerations throughout the process. Understand the vital role of technology in environmental sustainability, promoting judicious use and addressing global challenges responsibly.
modules: Modules Master ML principles for real-world problem-solving. Hone skills in supervised research and critical analysis. Year 1 Build robust database foundations with advanced concepts. Explore data visualisation to enhance dataset understanding. Acquire NLP expertise for practical applications. Year 2 Delve into computer vision, gaining hands-on experience.
career: Career prospects Enter the world of AI and ML careers as machines gain human-like intelligence. MSc (AI and ML) equips candidates with research-focused skills for diverse opportunities. Curriculum ensures theoretical AI knowledge and hands-on experience with industry tools. Gain exposure to research models and industry application development in specialised domains.
